entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Murdochville
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
